channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Acrobat for Edge
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Acrobat for Edge

item.title: CVE-2024-20721|2024-01-15T12:13:09.558Z -- Adobe -- Acrobat for Edge
item.description: Acrobat Reader T5 (MSFT Edge) versions 120.0.2210.91 and earlier are affected by an Improper Input Validation vulnerability. An unauthenticated attacker could leverage this vulnerability to achieve an application denial-of-service in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2024-20709|2024-01-15T12:13:10.365Z -- Adobe -- Acrobat for Edge
item.description: Acrobat Reader T5 (MSFT Edge) versions 120.0.2210.91 and earlier are affected by an Improper Input Validation vulnerability. An unauthenticated attacker could leverage this vulnerability to achieve an application denial-of-service in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.
